website_summaries.verdict: A mid-level option that's worth considering for its affordability and handy features, but it also comes with some concerns including cushioning that may or may not work for you.
pros: Earns praise for being easy to move along the ground while gardening
cons: Mixed opinions from owners on the cushioning it provides – can be too firm or too soft
Some consumers received pads without handle slots

customer_reviews.title: Perfect firmness for sitting
customer_reviews.text: Although sold as a knee pad, I use it for a cushioned seat in the shower, as I have a bad back and can't sit on a hard object (such as the marble shower seat), as it would rotate my pelvis. It's firm, but soft enough to cushion my hips and not cause pelvis rotation, the latter of which would send me to my doctor. I suspect if it's good enough for my medical use, it will work great in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: mr.gokart

customer_reviews.title: THICK, COMFORTABLE, PROTECTIVE...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this kneeling pad (plus I really like the blue color). We're taking care of three puppies currently, which requires a lot of kneeling down. Having recently had a knee injury, all the ups and downs were exacerbating the injury. This pad is thick and comfortable, and helps make all the ups and downs more comfortable. This would obviously be perfect for anyone who is doing a lot of gardening, or anyone who has to kneel on the the ground for any purpose. It could also be used to sit on, when one has to sit on a hard bench. Since it's lightweight, it would be easy to take with you. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DreamyOneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It's Perfect for our needs. Sturdy and does the job to protect your knees!
customer_reviews.text: I give this mat 5 stars and exceeded my expectations! I use it kneel on when bathing my disabled 13 year old. Stacks of towels is how I used to handle it. This mat may seem super hard when you get it. At first, I doubted my decision. I kneeled on it once was so thrilled to have just the right tool. Highly encourage other customers to "bank" in on this one, Very reasonable cost too.
customer_reviews.author: Bls fan

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the product
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I’m 6’5” 410 lbs I use this at work when I have to get into utility vaults. The pad is like 2” Thick and Works great I have a reconstructed acl and I’m able to put weight on to it
customer_reviews.author: GiantLocator

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: This pad is not a comfort pad. It is way too hard to use. I should have bought the Leatherman pad. I was trying to save a few buck and received junk. Penny wise and pound foolish. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good kneeling pad
customer_reviews.text: Very firm and durable! I am satisfied with my purchase and would recommend it. I kneel on it in the morning and it really helps my back when I do this. Not sure why it helps my back but it does. Nicely made!
customer_reviews.author: TLTrue

customer_reviews.title: Tough, well made and VERY Firm!
customer_reviews.text: These are well made knee pads, however the described "Memory Foam" is so FIRM it actually hurt my knees to use it. There was no give in either pad I received. Great size and shape but too bad there is not more cushioning for my senior knees. Will have to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: firm but good
customer_reviews.text: This pad isn't soft soft. It's kind of firm but it does a great job. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Matthew S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Firm, but great pad
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift, and when I received it in the mail was very concerned at first that it was just too hard to really use, let alone for a long period of time. Well, I was wrong! It’s a firm pad, but does give nicely & doesn’t squish down so much that you feel rock under you like thin ones can. So far my 70 year young Mom really likes it & hopefully it lasts for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sliver

customer_reviews.title: Dad loved it
customer_reviews.text: Dad loved it spouse has been doing lots of planting and needed something to kneel on. We have a smaller one and it's getting old and I thought this would be a perfect gift from our daughter to daddy for Father's Day. He absolutely loves it and it's sturty, comfy and has a nice little handle to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: kimadina

customer_reviews.title: Kneeling pad is great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love the kneeling pad. It is thicker than the other ones I purchased in the past and we will get a lot of use out of it. Thank you for the great quality of your item and also for the great service.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Plenty large enough, very light and excellent cushioning. Cleans easily as well. I would easily recommend this to anyone who wants a garden kneeling pad.
customer_reviews.author: Niksurfs

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just getting back to Pilates, and I needed something to cushion my right knee. This ain't it! Not only is it hard as a rock, it also has a patterned surface. Keep your money!
customer_reviews.author: Pam E.

customer_reviews.title: Knee Saver
customer_reviews.text: My partner is a gardener with particular tastes and requirements for her work tools. She’s used several different types of kneeling/sitting gardening devices and regularly complained about knee pain. This pad looked sturdy, lightweight and comfortably thick (especially compared to others), so I bought it. I’m glad I did because she loves it. She says it’s sturdy, comfortable and has saved her knees (and pants) from being damaged. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Seem heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to keep on my van. I do commercial / Industrial HVAC. KneePads are essential for this line of work. For years I’ve been using these green pads Menards has that are sold as seats for like bleachers. Those were good, except not waterproof, and not as long lasting as I’d like. So far with these (bought 2) I can tell they will likely last longer. They are waterproof. They are not as soft, which I see as a trade off for the longevity I’m seeking. They definitely will do the job. Just drop them, and drop down. I just ordered 2 more for the house.
customer_reviews.author: D&D B

customer_reviews.title: Makes kneeling on concrete so much less of a pain
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? The foam is really thick, and even dropping my knees down at quite a speed doesn't make them "bottom out" against the floor. It's well made, I think it'll last me a good long time. My knees thank me for buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Andrews

customer_reviews.title: My knees thank me every day I use this! ...
customer_reviews.text: My knees thank me every day I use this! The gloves, on the other hand....for some reason, they "stick" to everything they touch when just laying there waiting for the next use. ALSO, I'm left-handed, so having the "claw" on the right hand is somewhat awkward for me.....guess I'm not ambidextrous enough. I don't suppose the "claws" could be a separate item that one glues into place upon arrival ?????
customer_reviews.author: Ellis B. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Should have read the one star reviews before buying
customer_reviews.text: The one star reviews are totally correct. I'm a gardener and after using this product, my knees are in pain after each use. It's going in the garbage. I'm so disappointed. Please don't waste your money like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dickenson

customer_reviews.title: Appropriate cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's hard like the other reviews say. I found it provided appropriate cushioning though. The larger-than-most size is nice so that I don't have to move it around as much when I shift positions.
customer_reviews.author: Jemez Fred

customer_reviews.title: Too hard.
customer_reviews.text: Most kneeling pads like this are quite a bit softer than these, and I prefer that. My left knee especially is more sensitive to a hard surface, which is why I wanted a kneeling pad in the first place. I threw these out and bought a softer one at a garden shop. They had several types and all were softer than this product. It was just a question of which size to get.
customer_reviews.author: GAT

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The foam did not give. It is too stiff and as a result caused my knees to hurt.
customer_reviews.author: smartshopper19

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft on my knees as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: This kneeling pad is thick, as advertised, and does cushion your knees from the hard floor. However, the surface of the pad is not smooth and that makes it harder to kneel on.. (I do admit this feature is clearly visible in the photos and I knew it before I ordered it - was just hoping it would feel softer). I also wish the carrying handle were in one of the ends, not the long side. I didn't think that would make a difference but it does, convenience-wise.
customer_reviews.author: Old Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good little cushion for work!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an electrician and he spends a lot of time with his knees on concrete. This pad is perfect and helps him after a long days work. He says it is also great for standing on as it provides good back support.
customer_reviews.author: DaniHart

customer_reviews.title: Stop what you’re doing and buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I never really thought about a product like this!!! So I was watching a YouTube video the other day and say a guy working on a car while kneeling on a similar product. I hoped on Amazon and immediately purchased this. If you do anything where you’re up and down or kneeling, I recommend this. I’ve used it for everything from changing brake pads to installing a new shut off valve in the bathroom. It’s so simple yet functional. I would absolutely recommend this pad
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It is thick and very firm, but comfortable. People should not literally be on the tip of their knees when they kneel, but instead, the bottom front just underneath the knee is where the body weight should be when kneeling, so for me, I'm satisfied with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Marie L.

customer_reviews.title: Good kneeling pad for work or for exercise
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this pad as an exercise pad. It is great for exercises on the ground that require kneeling, such as yoga poses. However the pad is firm plastic and probably not stable for more active exercises that require moving or jumping around that might move the pad. Small pad that is easy to travel with and would be great for manual labor that requires you to be on your knees a lot. Great item and would strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: This is a VERY firm kneeling pad
customer_reviews.text: I just got this kneeling pad and it seems to be exactly what I ordered and I'm gonna keep it but know when you order it, it's VERY firm. This is about as firm as something called a pad can be and not be hard. But with as much use as it will get, I suspect it will actually end up more comfortable as I'm actually kneeling on a concrete floor over and over again at my job.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C.

customer_reviews.title: Just what my knees have been asking for
customer_reviews.text: As I gain numbers to my age, my body simply does not work the same as it once did. Getting on my knees to do work under the RV or cabinets was quite uncomfortable, if not sometimes painful. This pad is super think and really a great size to help provide the comfort. Ive now used it twice since I bought it, and cannot believe just how simply a thing this is, and wonder why did I take so long to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan B. Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Too firm
customer_reviews.text: It's too firm. I'm 250lbs and it barely squishes. I used my jacket as a kneeling pad instead. The AWP brand from Lowes is a much better choice
customer_reviews.author: fatty

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mechanic knee pad
customer_reviews.text: Much better than any other implementations I've been spending money on. I grab this whenever I need to set the lift up under the car, and it saves my knees 100%. Thick foam, proper density to kneel on, seems to have great durability and is not falling apart at all. Not much more I can say about it, would buy a few more if I needed them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great knee saver for many projects
customer_reviews.text: I use this pad for kneeling to work in flower beds and when cleaning floors. I have one each for front, back and side yards and bring inside for cleaning floors or cleaning/organizing lower cabinets. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: pennzer

customer_reviews.title: Great All Around Kneeling Pad
customer_reviews.text: Great kneeling pad. Very nice color green. Sturdy, comfortable, very lightweight and just the right size. I've used this several times in damp grass and dirt areas and have not had to wash it down at all. So clean that I bring it into the house and leave it by the door when I'm through. Protects my knees and keeps my knees and legs clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: Since I am non weight bearing, post foot surgery for seven weeks; the pad aids my crawling up/down steps. Since I have knee replacements, too, I must be careful kneeling on hard surfaces. Ours is a century old home with one bath on the second floor. Needless to say my time off the second floor is limited, additionally there are steps on the outside. One becomes creative in navigating said impediments but my trusty purple pad is the best.
customer_reviews.author: MIMI M

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a thick comfortable kneeling pad. I purchased one for my daughter for comfort while bathing my grand daughter. I liked it so much that I purchased one for me for gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Gwenalee

customer_reviews.title: Live changing!
customer_reviews.text: Silly to say but these are life changing. I have 6 large gardens to weed and these kneeling pads are terrific. I bought 2 , one for me, and one for my husband. He used his for all sorts of chores that involve kneeling by sprinklers, outlets and around the house. These are nice and thick but super light to carry around. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Atwell

customer_reviews.title: Not for comfort
customer_reviews.text: If you main purpose is to put this on the rocky driveway or rough surface it will definitely protect your knees. Go for it. If like me you want cushy comfort for longer kneeling periods, look for an alternative with a layer of memory foam on the top. Don't just get one that is only high density foam which is rock hard. We returned and bought the KI Store Garden Kneeling Pad.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Storyteller

customer_reviews.title: Large, Comfy Support! Well Worth The Price!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about a kneeling pad this big, but was proven wrong. I primarily use this for cleaning my own cars. As I've been doing that for 40 years, my years are advancing & this pad makes the time spent easier on knees & joints. It also helps me reach all lower areas & wheels for regular detailing. I have a gravel driveway & don't feel any discomfort when using this pad. I fully recommend 😎
customer_reviews.author: Bru-sky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Great, Wonderful, Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I drive a tanker truck and have to get on my knees to attach hoses to the bottom of the tanker and railcars. The asphalt and gravel was killing my knees before I got this pad. I can't say enough how great this has been for me. If you want to protect your knees while having to work on asphalt or gravel you need this knee pad.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Helps Those Sore Knees!
customer_reviews.text: Extra thickness is a welcome touch for anyone w/knee issues! Husband loves it when messing w/car & I use when gardening. Much thicker than standard ones.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Y  Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kneeling pad to use during a recent move, where I often had to kneel while disassembling and assembling furniture. It worked perfectly for me. Other reviewers said the pad was too hard for them, but I didn’t find that to be true. As a point of reference, the firmness is about the same as a pair of Crocs.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse P.

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT for tender knees
customer_reviews.text: Damage to my knees from a wreck years ago prevents me from doing many jobs I once did without thought. I ordered this to use while bathing my dog. This mat is better than the hard floor, but just a smidge. I need a supportive yet soft mat, but this isn't it. I will order a different one and pass this along to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Pointless
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in both knees and was looking for a cushy pad for cleaning and exercising. This was a bad choice as it is barely any softer than a wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Squared

customer_reviews.title: Better than your average kneeling pad
customer_reviews.text: Most of the kneeling pads I see in the local stores are not very thick or have a large surface area, sometimes having me stack two on top of each other to have it feel decent when doing some yard work. With this kneeling pad, it is both large and thick for added comfort and space, making it an excellent choice to replace my other ones.
customer_reviews.author: MitchellTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock!
customer_reviews.text: This item is way too firm, I returned it. It's light and compact but if you intend to kneel on it for more than 2 minutes, I would look for another one as this one feels as hard as a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: PAIN SAVER for the knees!!!
customer_reviews.text: With tendonitis in my knees & who knows what else, I get crazy pain from kneeling on any surface, even if i use knee pads. If i needed to get down low i would have to bear the intense pain, or just say forget it, it's not worth the pain! This thing is a pain saver! I can kneel, & for long periods of time if i have to, no problem! I will be purchasing another one to keep in my car!
customer_reviews.author: free-gone

customer_reviews.title: Good protection from hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: This product surpassed all my expectations. I'm only 8 months after having my knee replaced and this pad is not too stiff to aggravate it, but still provides all the protection I need, even on concrete surfaces. Plenty of room to get my knees on it comfortably. I keep it in my truck in case I ever need to change a tire, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to prevent early knee pain.
customer_reviews.text: Great if your knees are fine and you want to avoid premature knee problems from kneeling. If you hav knee pain , when kneeling, then get a SOFTER version. It does not slide easily, so providing a stable footing. Color is cool. Handle is just right . I have used it heavily (satisfactorily) for loading laundry on a front load machine/dryer, and mopping hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Yusaf

customer_reviews.title: a godsend to me knees
customer_reviews.text: oh my what a difference this makes! i can now garden in comfort. no more knee pain from kneeling on the ground with rocks digging into my knees. and the blue does not get lost. dont know why i hesitated so long to get one and this one is perfect - in size, shape and function.
customer_reviews.author: massma

customer_reviews.title: My knees were still pretty soar after using this to wash the floors
customer_reviews.text: My knees were still pretty soar after using this to wash the floors by hand, as this is still fairly hard. It is better than the floor, yet still a little too hard. Maybe this product on the bottom with a softer layer with gel on top (for the knees) would be a cool idea.
customer_reviews.author: TheJourney

customer_reviews.title: Foam pads
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, because it is sturdy, durable and lightweight! I use it when doing yard work, kneeling on knees to clip around hard to get places. Comes in handy when detailing and dressing tires and wheels on my car. It is comfortable to kneel and sit on. I have purchased 4 of these pads!
customer_reviews.author: James Pelander

customer_reviews.title: Really thick kneeling pad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pad for yard work, but right after I got it, my husband used it for auto work in a gravel yard. It has a few scratches and gouges in it now, but it's so sturdy and thick that it didn't faze this pad at all. He said that it was way more comfortable than a tarp on his knees. Oh yeah, and it's very easy to carry with the built in handle. I think it's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: percenturynine

customer_reviews.title: A sure knee saver
customer_reviews.text: Nearing 70, it's a must for me. I generally use it to get down to my yoga mat & other little used inside the house, makes a huge difference. I have even used it to adjust yard sprinkler, maybe I will get one just for that purpose next summer. I love the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye83

customer_reviews.title: #1 Knee pad comfort.
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I both love the kneeling pad. Lots of comfort for your knees. Does not break down like most kneeling pads. Worth every penny. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned because the pad felt very firm however, the pad works very well. I tweaked my knee while working out but, the pad has allowed be to continue working out without all the stress on my knee. Covid -19 trying to drop 19 pounds while social distancing lol.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: NIce size and comfortable to kneel on.
customer_reviews.text: First off, this is a nice size to kneel on in the garden. It seems sturdy, yet comfortable enough on my knees. This is also thick so you don't feel small rocks underneath the pad. I'm hoping this pad lasts for a while since I will use it for a couple of hours every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for gardening
customer_reviews.text: The 1.5" thick foam pad is awesome, i had some thinner knee pad foam before at around 1" and they became flat quickly after a few usage, this one is pretty sturdy and strong, so far been using it while doing my gardening past weeks and it's still like new. Good quality and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: WinWin

customer_reviews.title: Rugged Kneeling Pad
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several hardware-store rubber kneeling pads over the years, mainly because they wear out after about six months of use. I purchased one of these TOUA pads some time ago and have used it extensively, no sign of wear. Wider and thicker than my previous pads, I am very pleased. Recently bought another for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: H.R. Everett

customer_reviews.title: Very thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for cushions I can use for gardening after having knee Pains since last year. The cushions I have gotten in the past are too soft and provide no support. I have only gotten to use them a few times but this have worked great and are very well constructed to last.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Kanth

customer_reviews.title: The best kneeler I've found
customer_reviews.text: I use kneelers every day in all kinds of conditions. This one is the best I've found. It is sturdy and easy to clean. Large enough to be useful. Textured so my knees don't slide off when I'm wearing shorts. This also holds up well to gravel which rips up softer pads.
customer_reviews.author: TomatoLady

customer_reviews.title: Saving my knees
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great little kneeler. It's lightweight but still heavy enough where it won't blow away in the wind. I've used this for a few months now. It's a lot better than wearing kneepads if you are going to be kneeling in the same spot for an extended period of time. It also doesn't get waterlogged in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Not as described. The pads that I received are 1.25 inches thick, not 1.5 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Mystique

customer_reviews.title: This is too hard to kneel on
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be something that would provide some comfort when kneeling on hard surfaces. It is actually not much softer than the tile floor I was hoping to use it on. 'Extra thick foam comfort' doesn't accurately describe this. Maybe extra large, but super hard foam and no comfort at all.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: NOT to be used on a seat! :)
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly thought this could be used for a seat cushion on a picnic table. Nope, way too hard. Just for the review's sake I did kneel on it and it does seem like it would be very sufficient for that purpose. Just not what I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Eding

customer_reviews.title: NOT comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use when wiping up the floor, etc. I have two knee replacements, so kneeling on the floor can be miserable! This item is so hard it is no better than the floor. I threw it in the garage to possibly use while gardening, but doubt that will be any better. Find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Luie

customer_reviews.title: Hard on knees
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a overall 2 star because it was as hard as a rock to kneel on. Yes it was light and sturdy but not comfortable at all. I ended up going to the hardware store and finding one that had everything the same except it was a softer foam. Softer foam was way easier on my knees way better in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Summer 4 ever

customer_reviews.title: Good for kneeling not for sitting
customer_reviews.text: I saw a review that said it was soft for sitting, not the one I received. It is good for kneeling, beter than hard to kneel on surfaces, still a bit to hard for me but expect it will soften up after use.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyD

customer_reviews.title: An EXCELLENT Knee Saver
customer_reviews.text: This pad is comfortable, portable, light weight and provides EXCELLENT support while protecting my knees. It is plenty wide to support an 'open' posture and is flexible and very supportive. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: lrkap

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: The pad is comfortable and light weight. It has a handle for you to hold on to. Easy to slide it around since its very light. I used to wear knee pads but it was hot and sweaty, this pad gives me the protection without being sweaty
customer_reviews.author: Ted Truong

customer_reviews.title: I love this Kneeling Pad!  Great fro the garden and around the home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pad to work in the garden, knelling down and pulling weeds, but now I use it not just for gardening, but for whenever I have a project that requires me to get on my knees. It saved me yesterday when I was taking apart some old wooden shelving and I had to be on my knees or butt for a few hours. It is really comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B Rien

customer_reviews.title: Not much softer than the ground itself
customer_reviews.text: My wife has one of these that she bought at Home Depot and it was soft and well manufactured. The one I received wasn’t any softer than the ground, I didn’t even unpackaged it, I sent it back immediately
customer_reviews.author: Amazon 66

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, thick and durable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice pad. I used it all through my pregnancy to kneel on to lean on my exercise ball; used it in labor as well. Now it is handy to kneel on by the bath tub when bathing baby!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Linsenmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size overall (both knees fit on the pad), and the thickness is perfect for uneven terrain, like river rocks in a garden bed. It's very firm foam, so it doesn't compress to nothing when I kneel on it. I've got a replacement knee, so I need the added protection this pad provides. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: W. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Great Kneelers!
customer_reviews.text: These kneeling pads are really nice! We use them on the grass at the outside confessional at our church. They’re comfortable, weather-proof, and keep knees and clothing from getting dirty. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pvt

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use outdoors while kneeling on my gravel walkways. Strong enough not to tear up on the rocky surface, thick enough not to compress under my 250 lb weight, and with a wipe clean surface. I carry it in my pickup truck also should I ever need to change a flat tire. Great gift idea also!
customer_reviews.author: TXSLEDS

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is not soft. Perhaps over time it softens. It will protect your knees and it is tough in that it will endure a lot of use. But it's not a physical therapy grade piece - it's really rigid.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Marty

customer_reviews.title: Great for bathtime with baby
customer_reviews.text: I use mine for bathtime with the baby. I use it for kneeling on the bathroom floor. It's great quality. Very thick and sturdy. Not dollar store quality. Definitely a good quality kneeler.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy K.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy for kneeling. I cut it to fit my kneeling thingy
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Pad.
customer_reviews.text: This pad does it’s job well. It seems quite stiff when you first feel it but when you kneel on it, it feels comfortable. I purchased this pad for the purpose of using it as a seat pad on a milk crate placed upside down. This pad makes sitting on the milk crate much more comfy and also raises the siting height about 1 1/2”. I use it for working on low areas on my car such as wheels and brakes. So far I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G. Cumming

customer_reviews.title: waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: This produce is so hard that it HURTS my knees to use it!! It is as hard as the concrete that I am trying to protect my knees from! Not returning it because after shipping costs and the time and effort it would take to return it, it would cost more than the $7 I would get back!! It is going to the dumpster!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lora Methvin

customer_reviews.title: Only way to work in the garden
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and it makes life so much easier for him. At 80 years old the knees don't work so well any more but with these kneeling pads he can still work to his hearts' content with his flowers and clearing out the weeds.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Killion

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the rest that this is my second one.
customer_reviews.text: I am always kneeing down all day long for one thing or another and this feels very comfortable. Well made and durable. I now have several placed around the house/ garage/yard.
customer_reviews.author: Torrch

customer_reviews.title: great kneeling pad
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best pads I have owned. It is large, sturdy and comfortable. It is not too hard but just right for my weight. Use it to work in garden and when I need to work on my cars.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I expected, decent for amount I spent. I think it will provide my husband a little comfort for his many garage projects, but I wish I would have spent a little more for something a little nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Sdgmict

customer_reviews.title: Helps with sore knees
customer_reviews.text: I really love this pad for cleaning the tub and around the toilet. My knees are arthritic and this pad keeps them from hurting. Its sturdy but still pliable... very comfortable to kneel on. Will get another for gardening..
customer_reviews.author: babs

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Knees aren't what they used to be and this keeps them comfy. Wish I'd used one long ago, as it makes weeding so much more comfortable! No more twigs and pebbles digging into my knees! Also used while changing a tire and working on fencong!
customer_reviews.author: HJM

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: Did not do what you want. Hard as a brick and about as comfy kneeling on one. Do yourself a favor go down to Napa and get one there, yes Napa auto parts, believe me its much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Droge

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: Was a perfect replacement for my old thin kneeling pad. This one is way softer and makes a huge difference on my knees when gardening now. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nima Saba

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mat, I use it for everything in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mat, I use it for everything in my tiled house, in the garage, and on job sites where I'm on concrete slabs. Pretty tough for being foam. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. I use it for gardening and household chores and it perform exactly as described. I’m giving them as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: avidrdr

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a kneeling pad for myself as I have a tendency to get down on my knees to clean the tub and toilet inside my home. This kneeling pad is pretty thick, yet very light weight. Perfect cushioning. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfy as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is THICK and durable. I'm hoping the cushion will break down over time because it is currently stiff. Some reason, I was expecting something more of a firm mattress feel than thick layers of cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Chickenuggets

customer_reviews.title: Kneeling Pad
customer_reviews.text: The Kneeling Pad is light weight and appears to be durable for half a season use for cleaning out landscape areas and working on lawn problems. It is not as soft as the last one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for household chores, such as cleaning the bathtub or the floors. It makes these chores much less taxing. Heavy duty; its cushiony although my weight barely pushes the mat down.
customer_reviews.author: a.albertine

customer_reviews.title: I can kneel for crafts/exercising
customer_reviews.text: My knees don't do well on hard floors and my craft work and exercises require that I kneel from time to time. This mat has taken the pressure off my knees and made it possible for me to do both comfortably. Interestingly, when I was trying to figure out how to duplicate my balance exercises I was given, I decided to try the mat (pillows weren't working for me). It was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Projects
customer_reviews.text: We have used it to save our knees during projects requiring kneeling and been quite happy with it. It always pops back into shape and has endured a lot of time on it. We have used it on concrete as well as other environments and it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Light and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for kneeling on asphalt. Very comfortable and perfect for use. Also very economical - have seen same brand at other stores for twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: A real knee saver!
customer_reviews.text: Using this now, as I steam clean grout lines on my kitchen floor. Totally saves my knees and is a pleasure as I can scoot along the floor on my knees as I tediously clean each grout line. Works as advertised with enough padding, light weight, so glad I got this. Will use for gardening too.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with it!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product when kneeling for weeding and found it to be very sturdy but soft for my knees. Quality product for the price. Very satisfied with it!
customer_reviews.author: fsmith

customer_reviews.title: Great thick kneeling pad for Yoga or around the house
customer_reviews.text: We really like this extra thick kneeling pad. It is durable and comfortable. Wipes off easy. We use it for yoga and for odd jobs around the house or garage. Such as clean my hub caps when sitting is just too high.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Rospotynski

customer_reviews.title: This is nice and thick but not bulky
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for kneeling. It's not flimsy and I can kneel for long periods. Not to bulky or heavy to carry either well worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

product_meta.title: Kneeling Pad Thick Extra Large Foam Comfort Kneeling Pad for Work Gardening Yoga Exercise Garden Knee Pad
feature_bullets: EXTRA THICK & IDEAL SIZE - 1-½ INCH the thickest kneeling pad on the market. Thick kneeling pad will provide best protect for your knees. Size 18'' x 11'' big enough that your knees won't crowed and it is also suitable for easy storage
DURABLE HIGH DENSITY FOAM- Made from high density, non-recycle, non-toxic material. It makes the kneeling pad durable and comfortable
MULTI-FUNCTION - Ideal for gardening, house cleaning, baby bathing, praying, and fitness like gym, yoga & pilates.
CONVINIENT - Lightweight and portable, waterproof material makes kneeling pad easy to cleaning and dries quickly
NO HASSLE GUARANTEE - Includes a 12 MONTH WARRANTY with our 90 days NO QUESTIONS ASKED money back guarantee.
